title: WHO AM I IN THE FABLE?
subtitle: Step into the world of timeless tales and discover which character you are in the fable.

q0.text: What would you do if you saw two friends arguing?
q0.a1: Help them talk and be friends again
q0.a2: Walk away and let them figure it out
q0.a3: Say something funny to make them smile
q0.a4: Use kind words to help them feel better

q1.text: Which superpower would you like to have?
q1.a3: The power to carry big things and protect
q1.a4: The ability to live long and stay calm

q2.text: How do you decide what to do?
q2.a1: I stop and think really hard first
q2.a2: I trust my feelings and go for it
q2.a3: I ask my friends what they think

q3.text: What kind of friend are you?
q3.a1: The one who always stays by your side
q3.a2: The one who makes everyone laugh
q3.a3: The one who’s there when things get tough
q3.a4: The one who’s clever and thinks things through

q4.text: Uh-oh! Something surprising just happened — what’s your move?
q4.a1: I take a deep breath and think carefully
q4.a2: I jump into action right away
q4.a3: I stay quiet and wait for the right time
q4.a4: I ask someone for advice or help

traits.lion: you are as brave as a lion!
traits.elephant: you are as wise as an elephant!
traits.duck: you are as kind as a duck!
traits.turtle: you are as calm as a turtle!
traits.hare: you are as fast as a hare!
traits.ox: you are as dependable as an ox!
traits.monkey: you are as playful as a monkey!
traits.dove: you are as loyal as a dove!
traits.fox: you are as clever as a fox!

print message: You may collect your printed story from the reception desk.
